metadata.title: CVE-2020-36189 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description: FasterXML jackson-databind 2.x before 2.9.10.8 mishandles the interactionbetween serialization gadgets and typing, related tocom.newrelic.agent.deps.ch.qos.logback.core.db.DriverManagerConnectionSource.

criterions.comment: jackson-databind package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
